code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const{t}=useTranslation();const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const login=user=>{localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(user));window.location.href='/';};const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('/api/users/login',{email,password});if(response.data.authenticated){login(response.data.user);alert(t('login_successful'));}}catch(error){if(error.response){alert(`${t('login_failed_error')}${error.response.data.error}`);}else{console.error('Login error:',error);alert(t('login_failed'));}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:t('login_title')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"input",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:t('email_placeholder'),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"input",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:t('password_placeholder'),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"button",children:t('login_button')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forgot-password",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/forgot-password",children:t('forgot_password_link')})})]})});}export default Login;
